description: This file defines the interface for the Bmc2ComExecutor helper API, including function prototypes for reader validation, reading, opening, and retrieving template names, used within the BMC2 management console system.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderValid
methods.description: Checks if the reader object is valid.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderRead
methods.description: Reads data into a buffer from the reader object.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderOpenExternal
methods.description: Opens an external resource with the specified name.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderOpenInternal
methods.description: Opens an internal resource with the specified name and content.

methods.name: Bmc2ComeoReaderGetTemplateName
methods.description: Retrieves the template name associated with the reader.
